reviewText: I wish we were able to rate with negative stars. This video is a joke - the instructor has clearly never taken a belly dancing class in her life. I have been a dancer for 34 years, belly dancing included. I couldn't help but nearly get angry while watching this mess! I was actually yelling at the TV (much to the amusement to my husband). It seems she is just making up moves that MIGHT resemble belly dancing, but come off as ridiculous. And she was wearing hip hop shoes?! Belly dancers don't wear hip hop shoes. There are FAR better belly dancing workout videos out there - shimmy away from this one as fast as you can.

DItto: This video owes it's viewers stars.  Denise Druce will go along with any fad out there.  Bellydance, check...hip-hop, check...etc.  The people she has teaching the belly dance class are NOT bellydancers.  I don't think they have even been to a real belly dance class.  The moves are sloppy, unimaginative, dangerous and embarrassing inept.  The moves are not done correctly, and will put undue pressure on viewers backs/hips/ and legs.  I would swear they are filming the videos in a large warehouse, with no homey, interesting touches.  If yuo want to learn real bellydancing get a DVD from: Jillina, Belly Twins, Neon, Sarah Skinner, Tanna Valentine, just to name a few.(Yes, I know this is what I posted on the other one, but there is not much more to say)
